snippet: The playwright Albert Innaurato, almost completely absent from the city’s stages for 25 years, has a one-act comedy in 59E59’s Summer Shorts series.
abstract: Albert Innaurato one-act play Doubtless, opening as part of 59E59’s annual Summer Shorts series, showcases brash and blasphemous style that made Innaurato one of most successful playwrights of 1970s; premiere also reintroduces long-exiled playwright to world that he often had fraught relationship with.
lead_paragraph: The playwright Albert Innaurato, almost completely absent from the city’s stages for 25 years, has a one-act comedy in 59E59’s Summer Shorts series.

headline.seo: Albert Innaurato Returns to the Stage With ‘Doubtless’
headline.main: For a Playwright Long Gone From New York Theaters, a Small Step Back
headline.print_headline: For a Playwright Long Gone From New York Theaters, a Small Step Back
